name: Glob Jump
description:
This game was created by Benedict 'Hopps' Balzer in January 2013 as part of the 'One Game A Month' challenge.

If you have any questions or problems don't hesitate contacting me.

  • E-mail: mail[@]hopps.me
  • Twitter: @Dev_Hopps
  • Website: Hopps.me

Note: The Mac version is untested. Since it is a Java game it should work but if you have any problems, please report them!
